description: React component for the applicant's jobs and matches page, allowing users to search for jobs and view matched jobs based on skill scores.

methods.name: ApplicantJobsPage
methods.description: Main React component handling job search and match display for applicants.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Fetches list of jobs based on search query.

methods.name: fetchMatches
methods.description: Fetches matched jobs based on candidate ID, skills, and score.
